en.training_kit: This cat has not begun training.
en.training_app: This cat has not finished training.

training_mentors.zero: This cat either did not have a mentor, or {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} mentor is unknown.

en.training_mentor_trait_influence: r_c influenced {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to be more likely to %{influence}.
en.graduation_early: {PRONOUN/m_c/poss/CAP} training went so well that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} graduated early at %{age} moons old.

leader_lives_left_df.zero: The leader has no lives left and has travelled to the Dark Forest.
leader_lives_left_df.one: The leader has one life left.

leader_lives_left_sc.zero: The leader has no lives left and has travelled to StarClan.
leader_lives_left_sc.one: The leader has one life left.

en.scar_from_injury: m_c was scarred from an injury (%{injury_name}).
